name: Pass the Controller
description:
This is a little game about how my brother and I used to play video games together when we were kids. Each one knew how to complete some areas that the other did not know so we could play together. Then I thought I'd make this game as a gift to my brother.

Press A/D or the Arrows to pass the controller. Esc to close.

This game was done as part of GiftJam 2018.
